goodMorningMessageOverrides.1/1: Happy New Year! As we turn the page from last year to this year, recall your most cherished memories and take time to appreciate your friends and loved ones who made these moments possible.
goodMorningMessageOverrides.2/14: Happy Valentine's Day! This morning, please take a moment to appreciate your loved ones... {!❤️|🖤|🩶|🤍|💙|🩵|💜|🩷|🧡|💛}
goodMorningMessageOverrides.4/1: Bad morning everyone, I hope you all suffer! ....APRIL FOOLS!!! May your day be pleasant and wonderful 🌞
goodMorningMessageOverrides.4/2: {phrases.morningIntro?}, for today is _Autistic Pride Day_! This is a very special day for most people in this server, so let's come together and show our pride 🧩
goodMorningMessageOverrides.4/9: Wake up, wake up! For today is truly a special one! Special, that is, for one of our dearest dogs. Please wish him a happy anniversary 🌞
goodMorningMessageOverrides.7/4: Good morning on this pleasant July 4th! {phrases.wellWish?} {!🎆|🎇|🇺🇸}
goodMorningMessageOverrides.10/31: Happy Halloween! I hope your morning is as spooky as it is delightful.
goodMorningMessageOverrides.11/4: Happy _National Candy Day_! To all {!those|you|my dogs} saying good morning today, you are as _sweet_ as you are {adjectives.positive?}!
goodMorningMessageOverrides.11/11: {phrases.morningIntro?}! Today is **11/11**, may all your wishes come true 🌠
goodMorningMessageOverrides.12/24: Good morning, for today is Christmas Eve! Please refrain from rustling about, sneaking, and peeking tonight, for Santa is on his way... 🎅
goodMorningMessageOverrides.12/25: Merry Christmas! I hope Santa brought you all not only the finest toys, but also the brightest of smiles! {!🎄|🌟|🕯️}

midMorningMessageOverrides.1/1: Only a few hours into this brand new year and I'm already feeling {adjectives.positive?}!
midMorningMessageOverrides.3/17: To any of you who have plucked the elusive four-leaf clover today, I implore you to go out and buy as many {!scratchers|lottery tickets} as possible!
midMorningMessageOverrides.4/20: {!Wow|Damn}... that {!hubba bubba|ganja|reefer|halflings' leaf|eldritch bluntweed|aged goatweed|grimy guam leaf} got {!me|a bot} {!yiiked|fugged} up...
midMorningMessageOverrides.9/29: I may have gone a bit overboard for _National Laxative Day_... I'll be seeing the bathroom now
midMorningMessageOverrides.12/25: Well, did Santa bring you guys anything good? Who got the best haul?
